article_text:
Hasbro Inc. reported lackluster results for its holiday quarter as weaker sales of toys for boys offset gains in girls' toys and board games.

However, shares rose 5% on Monday, after analysts said the results were enough to put Hasbro on positive footing for 2014 and coming TV and movie tie-ins should re-energize its sales.

...

twitter.description: Hasbro reported a lackluster holiday quarter, but investors remain optimistic about the toy maker because of new movies and television shows involving Transformers, Marvel characters and Star Wars.
twitter.title: Hasbro Reports Weak Holiday Quarter

image.alt: Hasbro's holiday was lackluster, but optimism abounds for 2014, sending shares higher $HAS

og.title: Hasbro Reports Weak Holiday Quarter

article_metadata.author: Ben Fox Rubin

article_summary:
Hasbro Inc. reported lackluster results for its holiday quarter as weaker sales of toys for boys offset gains in girls' toys and board games.
However, shares rose 5% on Monday, after analysts said the results were enough to put Hasbro on positive footing for 2014 and coming TV and movie tie-ins should re-energize its sales.
